Examples: Monday, today, last week, Mar 26, 3/26/04

I noticed that the Bitdefender process can be easily killed

JOJOshaun ✭
March 30 in Central

I noticed that the Bitdefender process can be easily killed, even at the R3 level. What if a malicious program damages the Bitdefender process? Bitdefender should strengthen its ability to protect itself.

0

Comments

  • Alex D. mod
    April 2

    Hello @JOJOshaun,

    Please provide us with more details regarding how you did manage to kill Bitdefender's processes. Also, did you manage to kill all of the processes?

    It would help us to know the operating system on which you did the test.

    0
  • JOJOshaun ✭
    April 4
    火绒剑独立版.zip
    https://community.bitdefender.com/en/discussion/comment/295068#Comment_295068

    use this app

    0
  • Alex D. mod
    April 9 edited April 9

    Hey,

    I tried running the files in a virtual machine. The .bat and x64.exe have prompted me with the following errors.

    "SC OpenService FAILED 1060: The specified service does not exist as an installed service."


    The exe: The system cannot find the file specified.

    3
  • Flexx ✭✭✭
    May 9

    I have shared the samples with malware research team. If samples are malicious detection will be added.

    Kindly select agree if your issue is resolved to close the ticket.

    Regards

    Flex

    2
  • loganwest ✭
    June 4

    how it will killed ?

    0

post_text.surface_form: I noticed that the Bitdefender process can be easily killed, even at the R3 level. What if a malicious program damages the Bitdefender process? Bitdefender should strengthen its ability to protect itself.

Hello @JOJOshaun, Please provide us with more details regarding how you did manage to kill Bitdefender's processes. Also, did you manage to kill all of the processes? It would help us to know the operating system on which you did the test.
火绒剑独立版.zip https://community.bitdefender.com/en/discussion/comment/295068#Comment_295068 use this app

Hey, I tried running the files in a virtual machine. The .bat and x64.exe have prompted me with the following errors. "SC OpenService FAILED 1060: The specified service does not exist as an installed service." The exe: The system cannot find the file specified.
I have shared the samples with malware research team. If samples are malicious detection will be added. Kindly select agree if your issue is resolved to close the ticket. Regards Flex
